name: Graetzer
body:
# About me My name is Simon Gr√§tzer and I'm a 21 year old software developer living in Aachen(Germany). I learned programming when I was around 12 years old, I started to work as a developer professionally when I was around 16. Currently I am mostly involved in projects for mobile devices (iOS and Android based) I'm also interested in web development with modern technologies like Play and Google's go programming language

In addition to my work, I am studying computer science at the RWTH Aachen University

My Blog
